title: Immune To The Tomb, SMALLER iPhone? 10.14.20
itunes:title: Immune To The Tomb, SMALLER iPhone? 10.14.20
description:
In episode 736, Jack and Miles are joined by Goatface Comedy's Aristotle Athiras to discuss Covid-19 reinfection, Amy Coney Barrett's confirmation hearing, voter suppression, college students drinking less, Apple's iPhone 12 announcement, Cops being uncanceled, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Scientists Confirm COVID Reinfection Case As Trump Baselessly Claims To Be Immune
  2. First US patient reinfected with COVID-19, study says. What does it mean for immunity?
  3. Amy Coney Barrett Ready To Curse Senate Like She Cursed Rose Garden, ALLEGEDLY
  4. Voter Suppression Fest 2020 Kicks Off In Georgia
  5. Study shows college students are drinking less
  6. APPLE’S IPHONE 12 EVENT LIVE BLOG
  7. ‘Cops’ Back In Production On New Episodes Following Cancellation
  8. Spokane’s NAACP president worries return of ‘COPS’ will do more harm than good
  9. Cops Is Back in Production After Being Canceled Amid Police Violence Protests...and I Just Want to Know Who Asked for This?
  10. These brands still haven't replaced their logos. Here's why
  11. WES WAX - Backseat Bacharach

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
